PyCharting - Multi-Chart Synchronization Demo

Synchronized cursor and zoom/pan across multiple chart instances

How to Use

  • Hover over any chart to see the synchronized cursor across all charts
  • Drag horizontally on any chart to pan - all charts pan together
  • Scroll or pinch on any chart to zoom - all charts zoom together
  • Toggle synchronization options above to customize behavior
  • The main chart shows OHLC candlesticks
  • Subplot 1 shows volume data (bar chart)
  • Subplot 2 shows an RSI indicator (line chart)
